title: karpaka valliyin
sahitya:
karpaka valliyin caraNa kamalam tanaik-kanavilum maravAdE nenjE


anupallavi

  papala piravi eDuttadu pOdhum bhavakkaDal tANDi magizhvuralAm shrI


caraNam    kAriruL shUzh kADu pOlum vAzhkkai kavalai varumai nOi karaDi vEngai bhayam
tIrak-karuNaiyuDan tirumayilaiyil vandu darishanam tarum dayai nidhi en annaik-
